B

beforeMessageProcessing(SimpleMessage) - Method in class bgu.csp.az.api.agt.SimpleAgent
you can override this method to perform preprocessing before messages arrive to their functions you can change the message or even return completly other one - if you will return null the message is rejected and dumped.
beforeMessageProcessingHooks - Variable in class bgu.csp.az.api.Agent
collection of hooks that will get called before message processing on this agent.
beforeMessageSending(SimpleMessage) - Method in class bgu.csp.az.api.Agent
override this function in the case you want to make some action every time before sending a message this is a great place to write logs, attach timestamps to the message etc.
beforeMessageSentHooks - Variable in class bgu.csp.az.api.Agent

broadcast(String, Object...) - Method in class bgu.csp.az.api.Agent
send the given message+arguments to all other agents excepts the sender (read the method send javadoc for more details about sending the message)
broadcast(Message) - Method in interface bgu.csp.az.api.Mailer
broadcast a message to all agents (except the sending agent)
buf - Variable in class bgu.csp.az.utils.FastByteArrayInputStream
